title: Question 1
text: What is the purpose of a variable in Java?

choices.a: Used to store data that can be used or modified as needed
choices.b: Used to repeatedly perform a single task
choices.c: Used to identify a portion of the program
choices.d: Used to change the appearance of the program

title: Question 2
text: According to Java naming conventions, which of the following is a variable?

title: Question 3
text: After the following statement int size = 5;, what is the value stored in size?

title: Question 4
text:
Consider the following program:

public class Test
{
    public static void main( String[] args )
    {
        int a = 9;
        System.out.println( a );
    }
}

What is the output of this program?

choices.a: The value of the variable a is being printed
